text: Good Morning! How are you today?
Great! How are you doing?
I am well. What are your plans for the day?
i will be working all day.
Yes, I am getting ready for work as well. Have you heard of the charity called Save the Children?
No I have not

It is a US based charity that helps kids by collecting money to help supply them with their basic needs like healthcare, food, and clothing. Today I am asking if you would consider even a small donation to STC, even $0.05 would help. Can the kids count on you?
$0.05? that is not bad I could probably do that.
Thank you! Everything really helps out. Have you heard about the recent storms in Hawaii?
I kind of saw some stuff about them on the news.

Well, STC has already pledged to help the kids in Hawaii. They do not waste any time and they get right to the world's problems. I know I would feel horrible if any kids in my family/extended family were suffering. Do you have kids in your family/extended family?
yes I have two a boy and a girl.
So you really understand kids! I like this charity because they make it so easy to give any amount. Were you interested in their website info?
yes that would be great i will take a look at it and tell you if i have decided to donate at this time or not
I already have you down for $0.05. Were you willing to pledge more?
i will donate 0.10 today

That is fantastic! They are US based, the US office is located in CT. The site tells of all the areas getting help, including war torn areas as well. It also details how people can sponsor individual kids. It is a  great organization, don't you agree?
yes sounds great.
I agree, it really is. It breaks my heart to know that while I have so much freedom there are kids that look at a simple meal as a lifesaving chance. So I have you down for $0.10, right?
That is correct.
